name: Tavern Drinks
description: A d100 table of magical and mundane tavern drinks. Roll when a player orders something interesting at the bar!

entries.name: Dragon's Breath Ale
entries.effect: After drinking, you can use a bonus action to exhale fire in a 10-foot cone. Creatures must make a DC 12 Dex save or take 1d6 fire damage. Lasts 1 minute.

entries.name: Mindflayer's Migraine
entries.effect: A deep purple liquor. You gain telepathy out to 30 feet for 10 minutes, but have disadvantage on Wisdom saves during this time.

entries.name: Goodberry Wine
entries.effect: Sweet elven wine. Heals 1 hit point and counts as a full meal. Non-alcoholic despite the name.

entries.name: Dwarven Gutbuster
entries.effect: Thick, dark stout. DC 12 Constitution save or be poisoned for 1 hour. On a success, gain advantage on saves against fear for 1 hour.

entries.name: Feywild Fizz
entries.effect: A sparkling pink drink that changes flavor with each sip. Roll on the Wild Magic Surge table (no effect on non-spellcasters, just pretty sparkles).

entries.name: Liquid Courage
entries.effect: Warm spiced rum. You have advantage on saves against being frightened for 1 hour, but disadvantage on Dexterity checks.

entries.name: Owlbear's Roar
entries.effect: Honey mead so strong it burns. Your voice becomes supernaturally loud for 10 minutes. Advantage on Intimidation checks.

entries.name: Shadowfell Stout
entries.effect: A pitch-black beer that absorbs light. You can see in magical darkness for 1 hour, but bright light is painful (disadvantage on attacks in bright light).

entries.name: Beholder's Eye
entries.effect: A shot with a pickled eye floating in it. Gain darkvision 60 ft for 8 hours (or extend existing darkvision by 30 ft).

entries.name: Troll's Blood
entries.effect: Thick green liquid. Disgusting taste. Regain 1 hit point at the start of each turn for 1 minute. Does not work if you've taken fire or acid damage.

entries.name: Moonshine
entries.effect: Literally glows in the dark. Provides dim light in a 5-foot radius for 1 hour after drinking.

entries.name: Giant's Toe
entries.effect: A massive mug of ale. DC 10 Con save or hiccup loudly every minute for an hour. On a success, you feel great!

entries.name: Pixie's Promise
entries.effect: Tiny sparkling cocktail. You shrink to half your size for 10 minutes. Your equipment shrinks with you.

entries.name: The Flumph
entries.effect: A bubbly blue drink that makes you hover 1 inch off the ground for 10 minutes. You leave no footprints.

entries.name: Mimic Mimosa
entries.effect: Changes flavor and color every round. 10% chance the mug tries to bite you (1d4 piercing damage).

entries.name: Lich's Last Laugh
entries.effect: Ancient whiskey with a skull-shaped ice cube. DC 15 Con save or fall unconscious for 1 minute. On success, gain resistance to necrotic damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Basilisk Bourbon
entries.effect: Petrifyingly strong. DC 13 Con save or be paralyzed for 1 round as your muscles lock up.

entries.name: Rust Monster Rum
entries.effect: Orange-brown and fizzy. Any non-magical metal object you're holding takes 1d4 acid damage worth of corrosion.

entries.name: Gelatinous Cube Shot
entries.effect: A wiggly, transparent shot. Swallowing it whole grants acid resistance for 10 minutes. Chewing it deals 1d4 acid damage to your mouth.

entries.name: Treant's Timber
entries.effect: Tastes like maple syrup and bark. You can speak with plants for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Storm Giant's Tankard
entries.effect: Served in an absurdly large mug. Lightning crackles on your skin for 1 hourâ€”creatures that touch you take 1 lightning damage.

entries.name: Invisible Ink
entries.effect: A clear, tasteless liquid. You become invisible for 1 minute, but the effect ends if you speak, attack, or cast a spell.

entries.name: Phoenix Firewater
entries.effect: Burns going down, burns coming up. If you drop to 0 HP within 1 hour, you immediately regain 1 HP. One use only.

entries.name: Kenku's Karaoke
entries.effect: After drinking, you can only speak by mimicking sounds you've heard in the last hour. Lasts 30 minutes.

entries.name: Displacer Beast Daiquiri
entries.effect: Your image shifts slightly. Attacks against you have disadvantage for 1 minute, but you have disadvantage on attacks too.

entries.name: Common Ale
entries.effect: Just regular ale. Nothing special, but it's cheap and refreshing.

entries.name: Elven White Wine
entries.effect: Crisp and elegant. No magical effects, just a pleasant evening.

entries.name: Halfling Cider
entries.effect: Sweet apple cider. Makes you feel like everything will work out fine. No mechanical effect, just vibes.

entries.name: Orcish Grog
entries.effect: Tastes terrible. DC 10 Con save or spend your next action retching. Popular with orcs for some reason.

entries.name: Gnomish Invention #47
entries.effect: Bright green and fizzy. Roll a d6: 1-2 you burp bubbles, 3-4 your hair stands on end, 5-6 you hiccup sparks.

entries.name: Siren's Song Sangria
entries.effect: Fruity and enchanting. You have advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks for 1 hour.

entries.name: Myconid Mushroom Tea
entries.effect: Earthy and calming. You can communicate telepathically with fungi for 1 hour. Most fungi have nothing interesting to say.

entries.name: Bulette Brandy
entries.effect: Strong enough to burrow through your liver. Gain tremorsense 10 ft for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Will-o'-Wisp Whiskey
entries.effect: Glowing ethereal spirits swirl in the bottle. You can see into the Ethereal Plane for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Aboleth's Memory
entries.effect: Thick, slimy, and ancient. Gain proficiency in one skill of your choice for 24 hours. DC 15 Wis save or have disturbing dreams when you sleep.

entries.name: Brass Dragon Brew
entries.effect: Warm and friendly. You can't stop talking for 10 minutes. Disadvantage on Stealth checks involving silence.

entries.name: Black Dragon Bitter
entries.effect: Extremely sour. You gain resistance to acid damage for 10 minutes.

entries.name: White Dragon Winter Ale
entries.effect: Served frozen. You gain resistance to cold damage for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Blue Dragon Bolt
entries.effect: Electric and sharp. You gain resistance to lightning damage for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Green Dragon Absinthe
entries.effect: Herbal and dangerous. You gain resistance to poison damage for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Red Dragon Reserve
entries.effect: Aged and spicy. You gain resistance to fire damage for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Bard's Inspiration IPA
entries.effect: Hoppy and encouraging. Once in the next hour, you can add 1d4 to an ability check.

entries.name: Paladin's Oath Porter
entries.effect: Rich and righteous. You cannot willingly tell a lie for 1 hour.

entries.name: Rogue's Reserve
entries.effect: Dark and mysterious. Advantage on Stealth checks for 10 minutes, but disadvantage on Persuasion.

entries.name: Wizard's Tower Toddy
entries.effect: Warm and intellectual. Advantage on Intelligence checks for 10 minutes, but disadvantage on Strength checks.

entries.name: Fighter's Fortitude
entries.effect: Simple and strong. Gain 1d4 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

entries.name: Cleric's Communion Wine
entries.effect: Blessed by a local temple. The next healing spell cast on you heals an additional 1d4 HP (within 1 hour).

entries.name: Warlock's Pact Punch
entries.effect: Suspiciously good deal. Gain 2 temporary HP, but your patron knows everything you say for the next hour.

entries.name: Druid's Wildberry Mead
entries.effect: Sweet and natural. Animals are friendly to you for 1 hour (not hostile creatures, just beasts).

entries.name: The Tarrasque
entries.effect: A legendary drink few survive. DC 18 Constitution save or fall unconscious for 8 hours. On success, gain immunity to the frightened condition for 24 hours and bragging rights forever.
